business and from the sale of our remaining McAfee share that occurred in 2022, lower maturities and sales of short-term investments, and increased
capital expenditures. These unfavorable cash flow impacts during 2023 were partially offset by higher 2023 proceeds from capital-related government

0: incentives and by other cash favorable investment activities, including lower acquisitions during 2023.

The methods, assumptions, and estimates that we use in applying our accounting policies may require us to apply judgments regarding matters that are
inherently uncertain. We consider an accounting policy to be a critical estimate if: (1) we must make assumptions that are uncertain when the judgment is
made, and (2) changes in the estimate assumptions, or selection of a different estimate methodology, could have a significant impact on our financial
